amendment.description: Amendment provides that when a person convicted of a serious violent felony is to be released from prison, releasing authorities will be required to notify victims of the crime, the families of such, the local media, and the convicting court of such release.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to expand the victim notification requirements in the bill to include notification of the local media and the convicting court prior to any sentencing or post conviction release.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Traficant amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
